**Convertible Bond — Conversion Parity Price**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
set.seed(808)
bond_price  <- round(runif(1, 950, 1400), 2)
ratio       <- round(runif(1, 20, 40), 0)
parity_px   <- round(bond_price / ratio, 2)

```

A convertible bond trades at \$`r bond_price`  and can be converted into `r ratio`  shares. What is the conversion parity price?
